SEARCH
Module Assignment1
Package appDomain

Class AppDriver

java.lang.Object
appDomain.AppDriver
public class AppDriver extends Object
Main driver class for the shape sorting application. Reads shapes from a file and sorts them using various algorithms and comparison criteria.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method that processes command line arguments and executes the sorting operation. Accepts three command line arguments: -f filename: the input file containing shape data -t [h|v|a]: comparison type (height, volume, or area) -s [b|s|i|m|q|z]: sort algorithm (bubble, selection, insertion, merge, quick, or heap)
      Parameters:
      args - command line arguments

    • parseArgs

      private static boolean parseArgs(String[] args)
      Parses and validates command line arguments.
      Parameters:
      args - command line arguments to parse
      Returns:
      true if arguments are valid, false otherwise

    • readShapesFromFile

      private static Shape[] readShapesFromFile() throws FileNotFoundException
      Reads shapes from the input file and creates corresponding Shape objects. The first line of the file should contain the number of shapes. Each subsequent line should contain: shape_type height dimension where dimension is either radius (for Cylinder/Cone) or side length (for Prisms/Pyramid)
      Returns:
      array of Shape objects read from the file
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the input file cannot be found
      IllegalArgumentException - if the shape type is invalid or data is malformed

    • printResults

      private static void printResults(Shape[] shapes)
      Prints the sorted array of shapes. Displays first element, every 1000th element, and last element.
      Parameters:
      shapes - array of sorted shapes to display
